Texts.Eng:
The Droden were created by the Avikan as expendable soldiers to use in their war against the Theleans. After their failed uprising during the Droden War, a ban was placed on the creation of new AIs, and nowadays only few true AI remain. Effective, light combat droids. Fragile, but resistant to radiation and poison.
